UserAccessPolicyFilter.name: UserAccessPolicyFilter
UserAccessPolicyFilter.description: Represents a user criteria filter for a user access policy.

ColumnName.description: If Target is set to User, the user field that your user criteria filter is based on.

Operation.description: The operator of the user criteria filter.

SortOrder.description: The numeric reference used to identify the specific filter.

Target.description: If your user criteria filter is based on a user field, set to User. If your user criteria filter is based on a package license, permission set, permission set group, permission set license, profile, or role, then this field isnâ€™t used.

Value.description: If Target is set to User, the value of the user field specified in ColumnName that your user filter is operating on. Otherwise, the ID of the group, package license, permission set, permission set group, permission set license, profile, role, or queue that your user filter is operating on.

UserAccessPolicyFilter.accessRules: To create or modify user access policies, users must have the Manage User Access Policies permission.
